long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly download stunning images from 500px.com with just one click using this lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension. Designed for photography enthusiasts and creative professionals, this extension simplifies the process of saving high-quality images for personal use or inspiration. Simply click on the extension icon on top right toolbar when you are viewing an image in 500px website and it will download full resolution version of that image.

Key Features:

One-Click Downloads: Save any image directly from 500px.com by simply clicking the download button.
Seamless Integration: Works directly on the 500px website, ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience.
High-Quality Images: Download images in their original resolution for optimal clarity.
Lightweight and Fast: Minimal impact on browser performance for a quick and responsive experience.
Free and Easy to Use: No complex setups or hidden charges.
Note: Ensure that you respect the copyright and usage rights of the images downloaded. This extension is intended for personal use only and does not bypass any licensing restrictions set by 500px.

Install now and build your personal collection of breathtaking photos with ease!
